last_episode_to_air.name: Back To The Furniture
last_episode_to_air.overview: Bobby gets into trouble and gets three punishments by his dad for ruining Grandma's antique table with packing peanuts. He dreams of his parents as children, hoping to get Howard in trouble as revenge.

name: Bobby's World
overview: Bobby Generic lives in a typical suburban neighborhood and uses his overactive imagination to discover a world of daring adventure, incredible wonder and lots of laughs â€” all in pint-sized perspective.

episodes.name: The Visit to Aunt Ruth's
episodes.overview: Bobby does not want to stay at Aunt Ruth's house.  He thinks he'll be bored and she smells.  However, Bobby finds that being with his Aunt Ruth is actually fun and he begins to look forward to going over again.

episodes.name: Uncle Ted's Excellent Adventure
episodes.overview: Uncle Ted and Bobby decide to have a campout in the back yard. This is Bobby's first time sleeping outside and he does not know if he is ready. At first Bobby can't wait, but when he finally does campout with Uncle Ted he is frightened by many things.

episodes.name: Adventures in Bobby Sitting
episodes.overview: Bobby's parents and Kelly are going out. Bobby and Derek are upset because they are getting a babysitter, but things turn out better than they thought.

episodes.name: The Best One of the Mall
episodes.overview: Bobby goes with his family to the mall, but ends up getting lost.

episodes.name: My Dad Can Fix Anything
episodes.overview: Bobby's dad tries to fix a plumbing problem in the house... with not much luck.

episodes.name: Me and Roger
episodes.overview: Bobby shows Roger his leash and he runs away. Now everyone has to find Roger.

episodes.name: The Big Sweep
episodes.overview: Bobby loses one of his mom's irreplaceable bedroom slippers.

episodes.name: The Night of the Living Pumpkin
episodes.overview: It's Halloween and Bobby is too little to go trick or treating, so Uncle Ted helps Bobby turn the house into a Halloween House of Horror.

episodes.name: Beach Blanket Bobby
episodes.overview: Uncle Ted takes the family out on his new boat and they end up stranded on an uncharted island.

episodes.name: The Revenge of Dr. Noo
episodes.overview: Bobby is afraid to see a new doctor after watching a scary movie on television.

episodes.name: In Search of the Ring Bear
episodes.overview: Bobby goes with his family to a relative's wedding, having the dubious distinction of ring bearer.  There are of course mishapps on the way to the wedding.

episodes.name: See America Last
episodes.overview: The family goes on a road trip to the Grand Canyon. Unfortunately, the trip doesn't go as smoothly as Howie thought it would.

episodes.name: Bobby's Big Broadcast
episodes.overview: Uncle Ted takes Bobby to a museum while Bobby daydreams about cartoons.

episodes.name: Three Kids and a Baby
episodes.overview: The Generic Family finds out that Martha's pregnant.

episodes.name: Suspects, Lies & Videotape
episodes.overview: Bobby accidentally crushes his mother's prized Elvis bust, but tries everything he can to pretend it never happened.

episodes.name: Clubhouse Bobby
episodes.overview: Bobby invites his friends to join his new club.  However, when he forbids someone from joining, his parents move in.

episodes.name: Nightmare on Bobby's Street
episodes.overview: Bobby watches a scary movie at the drive-in theater and has nightmares until Uncle Ted tries to help.

episodes.name: Caution: Bobby at Work
episodes.overview: Bobby spends a day at work with Howard at his office.

episodes.name: Total Recess
episodes.overview: Bobby has his first day at pre-school.

episodes.name: Chariots of Bobby
episodes.overview: Bobby competes in a neighborhood olympics.  Things turn sour when his family starts putting too much pressure on him to win.

episodes.name: Bobby's Birthday Bash
episodes.overview: Bobby's fifth birthday was put off by Martha going into labor, only to realize it is a false alarm. The rest of Bobby's family work to make his makeup party a success.

episodes.name: Bobby's Tooth or Dare
episodes.overview: Bobby gets a loose tooth, and all heck breaks loose.

episodes.name: Bobby's Big Move
episodes.overview: Bobby and his family are moving to a new and bigger house, but Bobby isn't happy with it because he loves the old house.

episodes.name: Bad News Bobby
episodes.overview: Bobby takes up T-Ball after going to a baseball game with Howard.

episodes.name: Swim by Me
episodes.overview: Bobby learns how to swim while he is afraid of a mysterious house until he meets the man who lives there, and finds out that the man isn't scary at all. This episode parodies the movie To Kill a Mockingbird.

episodes.name: The Play's the Thing
episodes.overview: Uncle Ted puts on a play. Bobby and the family are the performers, but all Bobby wants to do is sing!

episodes.name: Fish Tales
episodes.overview: The Generics take a fishing trip to Canada.

episodes.name: The Music
episodes.overview: Bobby learns a life lesson from his friend Abe the crossing guard while having a test on shapes in school.

episodes.name: Misery Loves Company
episodes.overview: Bobby spends the night with a friend who keeps blaming him for his own bad behavior.

episodes.name: Bobby Phone Home
episodes.overview: Bobby gets locked out of his house, and cannot figure out what he should do.

episodes.name: Baby Brother Blues
episodes.overview: The baby is coming and Bobby is feeling left out because he's not getting any attention.

episodes.name: Bobby's Girl
episodes.overview: It's Valentines Day and Bobby realizes he might like his friend Jackie.

episodes.name: Ill Effects
episodes.overview: Uncle Ted tells Bobby stories while he is sick.

episodes.name: I Want My Mommy
episodes.overview: The Generic family celebrates Mother's Day at an amusement park.

episodes.name: The Hero
episodes.overview: When a missing baby is recovered in the Generics' backyard, Bobby is mistaken for a hero and showered with accolade and presents.

episodes.name: Uncle Ted's New Friend
episodes.overview: Bobby discovers that Uncle Ted's new girlfriend is a thief.

episodes.name: The World Accordion to Bobby
episodes.overview: Martha and Aunt Ruth make Bobby take up the accordion.

episodes.name: Bobby Ties the Knot
episodes.overview: Bobby develops a crush on a substitute teacher.

episodes.name: Jets, Choo-Choos, and Cars
episodes.overview: In an effort to get some rest, Martha and Howard send Bobby and Derek to their grandmother in Minnesota.

episodes.name: Karate Bobby
episodes.overview: Bobby takes up karate to fend off bullies, but gets himself into trouble for misusing his skills. This episode is a parody of The Karate Kid.

episodes.name: A Day with Dad
episodes.overview: Bobby helps his father and Uncle Ted fix the bathroom light so he can go to the amusement park.

episodes.name: Psycho Bobby
episodes.overview: Bobby tries to create a statue of his mom for her birthday and comes across as acting very odd from everyone else's point of view.

episodes.name: The Smell of a Tattletale
episodes.overview: Bobby starts telling all the moms everything their kids are doing, then wonders why the neighborhood kids are angry at him.

episodes.name: It's My Party
episodes.overview: Howard says he has to postpone his plans to help Bobby build a fort in order to help Martha host Kelly's sweet sixteen birthday party, which angers Bobby, and as a result, Bobby unintentionally ruins Kelly's party.

episodes.name: One Clump or Two
episodes.overview: Bobby tries to prove his friend Ozzy, he is innocent so that he can sleep over.

episodes.name: Bobby's Big Dream
episodes.overview: Bobby goes out for an audition at the mall for a commercial.

episodes.name: Bobby, the Musical
episodes.overview: Durring a blackout, Bobby performs different styles of songs.

episodes.name: Rebel Without a Clue
episodes.overview: Bobby is influenced by a new boy named Anthony, to become bad after Derek bullied him so much.

episodes.name: Geriatric Park
episodes.overview: Bobby goes to visit his great grandpa Generic and learn about the many generations of his grandfather at Jerry Atric's Home for the Aged.

episodes.name: Harry Takes a Powder
episodes.overview: Bobby loses Jackie's hamster. This is a parody episode of An American Tail.

episodes.name: Bobby's Big Boo-Boo
episodes.overview: Bobby needs to get his tonsils removed.

episodes.name: Mom on Wheels
episodes.overview: Bobby spends the day with his mom at her job at Big Roy's while his dad goes on a job interview.

episodes.name: Weekend at Teddie's
episodes.overview: Bobby spends the weekend at Uncle Ted's, to take a break from his family. But it isn't what he expected.

episodes.name: Generics Under Construction
episodes.overview: Bobby must figure out how to tidy up his family's remodeled house for a photographer.

episodes.name: Mrs. Noogiefire
episodes.overview: Uncle Ted dresses up as an elderly nanny to prove he can take care of the kids.

episodes.name: Bobby Slicker
episodes.overview: Martha wins a sweepstakes and the family gets to go to Dude Ranch.

episodes.name: No Sale
episodes.overview: Bobby tries to sell the most candy in the school money sale so he can win pair of skates.

episodes.name: Who You Gonna Call...???
episodes.overview: Bobby gets locked out of his house and cannot figure out what he should do.

episodes.name: Starring Bobby
episodes.overview: The TV is broken so Bobby acts out movies for Kelly and Derek.

episodes.name: The Truth About Aunt Ruth
episodes.overview: Bobby learns lessons about telling the truth.

episodes.name: Bobby On-Line
episodes.overview: The Generic family gets a computer and chaos ensues. Bobby is the only one of the family that is not allowed to use it.

episodes.name: Bobby the Genius
episodes.overview: A university professor tells Bobby that he is a genius. It causes Bobby to be an egotistical jerk.

episodes.name: Hooked on Caps
episodes.overview: Bobby discovers that he is good at playing caps.

episodes.name: Bobby's Last Stand
episodes.overview: Bobby has to do chores to earn money to buy the X-15 Super Saturating Soaker Hose.

episodes.name: Miracle on 34th St. & Rural Route 1
episodes.overview: Bobby learns about the true meaning of Christmas while visiting family.

episodes.name: Just Plain Sleepless
episodes.overview: Bobby thinks that Uncle Ted is lonely and tries to find him a wife.

episodes.name: Bobby, Lord of the Slopes
episodes.overview: Uncle Ted takes the kids on a ski trip.

episodes.name: Time After Time
episodes.overview: Bobby learns the concept of time.

episodes.name: Independence Bobby
episodes.overview: Bobby tries to be independent and wants to get a buzz cut for the 4th of July. He thinks 4th of July is to get what you want.

episodes.name: Bobby the Candidate
episodes.overview: Bobby runs for class president. However, he's bad at running a campaign.

episodes.name: The Importance of Being Ernest
episodes.overview: Bobby wants desperately to read Kelly's diary. But he can't read.

episodes.name: Bad Manners Bobby
episodes.overview: Bobby learns about the importance of manners.

episodes.name: Roger's Ransom
episodes.overview: Bobby thinks that Roger is kidnapped and held for ransom.

episodes.name: Cooties
episodes.overview: Bobby is worried that he has come down with a terrible disease... the cooties.

episodes.name: Promises, Promises
episodes.overview: Bobby learns a lesson about keeping his word.

episodes.name: Generics and Indians
episodes.overview: Bobby learns about the importance of Thanksgiving.

episodes.name: It's A Generic Life
episodes.overview: Bobby take care of the twins and learns that they're not so bad after all.

episodes.name: Cruisin' Bobby
episodes.overview: The family goes on a cruise and Bobby learns a lesson about practical jokes.

episodes.name: Dad's Big Day
episodes.overview: Bobby tries to figure out what to get his dad for Father's Day.

episodes.name: Blue Eggs And Bobby
episodes.overview: Bobby has the blues because he is too young to play with Kelly and Derek and their friends.

episodes.name: Back To The Furniture
episodes.overview: Bobby gets into trouble and gets three punishments by his dad for ruining Grandma's antique table with packing peanuts. He dreams of his parents as children, hoping to get Howard in trouble as revenge.
